fields.headline: Quick getaways
fields.bodyText: · Paris Disneyland has two nights B&B at its Hotel Cheyenne, entry tickets and ferry crossings for a car and four passengers in half-term week from £198 for adults (children 3-11 £57). Great Escapes (08701 607501). · Travelscene (020 8424 9648) has four-night breaks at several Gran Dorado Holiday Parks in Holland from 26 May. Park Loohurst, northern Limburg, is £425 for five people, Port Zelande, near Middleburg, is £507 for six . Both include ferry crossings. · Seven nights' camping at La Torre del Sol on Spain's Costa Dorada from 24 May with Vacansoleil (08700 778779) for up to six is £316 for tented accommodation - or £413 for a mobile home - including ferry for car and passengers. · Classic Cottages (01326 565555) has some properties available from 24 May in south Devon. Catmint Cottage near Torquay, which sleeps four, is £423 for the week. · Reductions are on offer from The Real Spain (020 8686 3638) for self-catering villas with pools in Nerja/ Frigiliana on the Costa del Sol. A week from 24 May for two adults and two children at the Villa Casa El Rojillo is £1,896, including flights from Gatwick to Malaga plus a car. · Develop diving and horse-riding skills while staying at the three-star Hotel Club Pinos Playa in the sheltered bay of Cala Santanyi in Mallorca. Seven nights' half board is £599 (children £485) from 25 May, including flights. Castaways (01737 812255). · Depart 21 May for Hammamet in Tunisia with Cadogan Holidays (023 80 828313) and seven nights at the five star Riu Palace Oceana on the beachfront. Excellent facilities and cuisine at a cost of £650 (children under 12 £409). Includes flights, transfers and half board accommodation. · Join in the celebrations for the 300th anniversary of the founding of St Petersburg. This five day fully organised programme with Travel for the Arts (020 8799 8350) departs 7 June. Accommodation is at the five star Astoria Hotel. The cost is £1995 for scheduled flights, transfers, breakfasts, two lunches and top category seats for four performances - music, ballet and opera. · Eurostar is running a one-off Bank Holiday weekend trip to Bordeaux leaving 23 May returning on the 26th. Fares start at £99 standard class (£149 first). There are a limited number of seats to book at the Eurostar Contact Centre (08705 186186; www.eurostar.com). · Six night Bangkok package for £469 with Trailfinders (020 7938 3939). Book by 23 May for travel up to 15 June. Includes accommodation (based on two sharing) at the three star Bel Aire Princess and flights from Heathrow. · Quick departure for four nights in the pretty coastal town of Honfleur, Normandy. Depart 17 May with Eurotunnel Motoring Holidays (0870 333 2001). £129 includes crossing for one car and passengers and B&B (based on two sharing) at the three star Mercure Hotel. · Whitsun bank holiday in Milan? Two nights for £235 leaving 24 May from Heathrow with accommodation at the four star Doria Grand Hotel close to the central station. Transfers not included. Lastminute.com (0207 7400 7044). · Prices are per person or for a whole family, as indicated.
